item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 日元对美元汇率跳升 1%，因美元汇率普遍走软
item.description: 在央行高官本周发表评论之前，日元兑美元反弹，在十国集团货币中涨幅居前。【原文：The yen rallies against the dollar, leading gains among Group-of-10 currencies before comments from top central bank officials this week.】

item.title: 科技股反弹，高额对冲成本表明怀疑态度
item.description: 最近美国科技股的反弹还不能让期权交易商信服。【原文：The recent rebound in US tech stocks isn’t convincing options traders just yet.】

item.title: 激进分子在 1987 年以来最严重的股市下跌期间买入日本股票
item.description: 激进投资者利用本月早些时候日本股市暴跌的机会增持股票，寻求对从制药商到建筑公司等各类公司施加更多影响。【原文：Activist investors took advantage of Japan’s stock rout earlier this month to boost their holdings, seeking more influence over companies ranging from drug makers to construction firms.】

item.title: 非洲可可收成可能会提高，但您的巧克力价格不会提高
item.description:
挑战包括疾病、气候变化和农民报酬低。【原文：

Challenges include disease, climate change and low farmer pay.

】

item.title: 大宗商品繁荣期即将结束
item.description:
在沐浴价格上涨的阳光之后，铁矿石面临暴风雪。【原文：

After basking in the sunshine of higher prices, iron ore faces a blizzard. 

】

item.title: 本地需求回升，中国铜出口从创纪录水平回落
item.description: 由于国内买家利用金属价格迅速回落的机会，中国上个月的铜出口量从历史最高点回落。【原文：Chinese copper exports dropped last month from an all-time high, as domestic buyers took advantage of the metal’s rapid retreat in price.】

item.title: Nifty 指数能否突破 25 011 点的历史高点？
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 泰国新总理有望本周结束内阁会谈
item.description: 泰国新任总理白通丹-西那瓦（Paetongtarn Shinawatra）在获得皇室批准成为泰国最年轻的领导人一天后表示，她预计本周将结束与联盟各党就内阁组成的谈判。【原文：Thailand’s new Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra said she expects to wrap up talks with her coalition parties this week about the make-up of her cabinet, a day after securing royal endorsement to become the country’s youngest leader.】

item.title: 金发姑娘 "情景推动亚洲货币升至五个月高点
item.description: 由于对美国经济衰退的担忧减弱、对美联储下月降息的押注以及国内背景的改善提升了该地区的情绪，亚洲货币反弹至 3 月份以来的最高点。【原文：Asian currencies rallied to the highest since March as ebbing US recession concern, bets on Federal Reserve rate cuts next month and an improving domestic backdrop lifted sentiment in the region.】

item.title: 需求减少将冲击印度汽车股的快速反弹
item.description: 由于未售出汽车的积压和汽车制造商不断增加的折扣给利润率带来压力，印度汽车股的火爆涨势正在逆转。【原文：A sizzling rally in India’s auto shares is reversing as a build up of unsold vehicles and growing discounts by carmakers pressure profit margins.】

item.title: Vanguard 和 BlueBay 赌日本央行加息交易会带来更多利润
item.description: 尽管在最近的大跌之后，市场对日本采取更多紧缩措施的可能性的定价急剧下降，但一些大牌投资者仍在押注日本在未来几个月内将进一步加息。【原文：A handful of big-name investors are still betting on more interest rate hikes in Japan in the coming months, sticking to their guns despite a sharp cut in market pricing on the likelihood of more tightening following the latest selloff.】

item.title: 印尼 2,300 亿美元预算计划中的股票赢家和输家
item.description: 随着当选总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）即将就职，印尼明年3600亿卢比（2300亿美元）的预算将提振消费、食品和医疗保健类股票。【原文：Indonesia’s 3.6 quadrillion rupiah ($230 billion) budget for next year will prop up consumer, food and health-care stocks as President-elect Prabowo Subianto is set to take office.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 中国停止公布关键经济数据。新加坡总理宣布新的施舍政策。泰国的关键刺激政策面临审查。以下是您今天需要了解的信息。【原文：China stops publishing key economic data. Singapore’s PM announces new handouts. Thailand’s key stimulus policy faces scrutiny. Here’s what you need to know today.】

item.title: 尤马否认将犯罪所得用于项目的指控
item.description: 由缅甸最富有的富豪之一塞尔吉-潘（Serge Pun）创办的房地产开发商 Yoma Strategic Holdings Ltd. 正否认有关将网上诈骗中心的犯罪所得用于资助项目扩建的指控。【原文：Yoma Strategic Holdings Ltd., a property developer founded by one of Myanmar’s richest tycoons, Serge Pun, is denying allegations that criminal proceeds from online scam centers have been used to fund a project expansion.】

item.title: 本周开盘石油下跌，加沙谈判和中国成为焦点
item.description: 石油在五个交易日中第四次下跌，原因是交易商追踪美国主导的努力，以确保以色列与伊朗支持的哈马斯在加沙地带长达10个月的冲突中实现停火。【原文：Oil declined for the fourth time in five sessions as traders tracked US-led efforts to secure a cease-fire in the 10-month old conflict between Israel and Iran-backed Hamas in the Gaza Strip.】

item.title: 亚洲将在杰克逊霍尔周平稳开局：市场综述
item.description: 在本周亚洲各国央行做出重要决定以及杰克逊霍尔年度会议召开之前，亚洲股市周一开盘将保持平稳。【原文：Asian stocks are set for a staid opening on Monday ahead of key central bank decisions in the region this week and the annual confab at Jackson Hole.】

item.title: 西太平洋银行利润上升，利润率压力出现缓解迹象
item.description: 西太平洋银行（Westpac Banking Corp.【原文：Westpac Banking Corp.’s profit edged higher as pressure on margins eased and mortgage lending grew faster than the wider industry, offsetting a fragile outlook for the nation’s economy.】

item.title: 政治动荡威胁泰铢回升，交易商静待 BOT
item.description: 在本周央行政策会议召开之前，市场正在消化该国最新的政治事件，泰铢近期的涨势正受到威胁。【原文：The Thai baht’s recent rally is under threat as markets digest the nation’s latest political drama ahead of this week’s central bank policy meeting.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 中国钢铁业危机导致铁矿石价格暴跌。与此同时，亚洲国家的大豆库存创下历史新高。在美国，炎热的夏季提高了对天然气的需求。【原文：A steel-industry crisis in China is sending iron ore prices tumbling. Meanwhile, soybean stockpiles are at a record high in the Asian nation. In the US, a hot summer is raising demand for natural gas.】

item.title: 为什么自由现金流对首席财务官来说比以往任何时候都重要？
item.description:
另外，一位衍生产品专家也透露了他的秘密。【原文：

Plus, a spinoff expert spills his secrets.

】

item.title: 全球债券交易员对通胀过于自满
item.description: 就在债券交易员越来越确信通胀终于得到控制的同时，一个投资者阵营也在悄悄地建立保护措施，以防范未来价格飙升的风险。【原文：Just as bond traders grow more assured that inflation is finally under control, a camp of investors is quietly building up protection against the risk of a future spike in prices.】

item.title: 南非议会将就 Eskom 能源成本上涨计划展开辩论
item.description: 南非民主联盟（Democratic Alliance）党发表声明称，南非议会将就该国国有能源公用事业公司的一项提案展开辩论，该提案可能导致明年电费上涨高达 40%。【原文：South Africa’s parliament will debate a proposal from the nation’s state-owned energy utility that could see electricity tariffs rise as much as 40% next year, according to a statement from the Democratic Alliance party.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚石油公司签署法令禁止向以色列出口煤炭
item.description: 哥伦比亚总统古斯塔沃-彼得罗签署了一项禁止向以色列出口煤炭的法令，以向本雅明-内塔尼亚胡总理的政府施压，迫使其结束加沙冲突。【原文：Colombia’s President Gustavo Petro signed a decree banning coal exports to Israel in a bid to pressure the government of Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to end the conflict in Gaza.】

item.title: 交易员需要美联储在杰克逊霍尔发出 "开始 "信号以保持股市反弹
item.description: 华尔街押注美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔将在怀俄明州杰克逊霍尔举行的央行年度会议上确认降息。但是，随着争论从 "会不会降息？"转向 "降息幅度会有多大？"—；股票交易者可能会感到意犹未尽。【原文：Wall Street is betting that Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell will confirm that interest-rate cuts are coming at the central bank’s annual confab in Jackson Hole, Wyoming. But as the debate shifts from “will they or won’t they?” to “how big will they go?” — stock traders may be left wanting.】

item.title: 尼日利亚希望通过出售国内美元债券筹集 20 亿美元资金
item.description: 据牵头安排人 United Capital Plc 称，尼日利亚正在通过向西非国家的国内投资者发行美元债券，目标金额高达 20 亿美元。【原文：Nigeria is targeting as much as $2 billion through the issuance of dollar-denominated bonds to domestic investors in the West African nation, according to the lead arranger United Capital Plc.】

item.title: 维度在澳大利亚推出新 ETF 以满足日益增长的需求
item.description: 维度基金顾问公司（Dimensional Fund Advisors）称，该公司将在澳大利亚主要股票市场推出三只主动管理交易所交易基金，以满足财务顾问日益增长的需求。【原文：Dimensional Fund Advisors is launching three actively managed exchange-traded funds on Australia’s main stock market to tap increasing demand from financial advisers, according to the company.】

item.title: 摩根大通、英杰华集团押注美国经济软着陆，摆脱新兴市场疲软态势
item.description: 摩根大通资产管理公司（JPMorgan Asset Management）、M&G 投资公司（M&G Investments）和英杰华投资公司（Aviva Investors）等投资者表示，他们抓住了本月初风险资产回落的机会，增持了新兴市场债券。【原文：Investors including JPMorgan Asset Management, M&G Investments and Aviva Investors say they seized on the retreat in riskier assets at the start of the month to bolster their holdings of emerging-market bonds.】

item.title: 泰国新总理正在审查 140 亿美元的现金分配方案
item.description: 泰国新上任的总理巴东塔恩-钦那瓦（Paetongtarn Shinawatra）表示，泰国的主要经济刺激措施— 向公民支付近 140 亿美元的现金— 需要进一步研究，以确保符合国家的财政纪律法。【原文：Thailand’s key economic stimulus — almost $14 billion in cash payments to its citizens — will need further study to ensure compliance with the nation’s fiscal discipline law, newly appointed Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra said.】

item.title: 土耳其施展拳脚，在非洲扩大影响力
item.description: 土耳其为扩大其在非洲的影响力并加强能源安全，将于下月派遣长达 86 米的 "Oruc Reis "号科考船前往索马里勘探近海石油区块。【原文：Turkey, seeking to extend its influence in Africa and strengthen energy security, will send the 86-meter long research vessel Oruc Reis to explore offshore oil blocks belonging to Somalia next month.】
